detaileddescription.para: Use this macro to set a default or static temperature offset.
Computes the ambient relative humidity using the Tetens formula for estimation of ambient vapor pressure

simplesect.para: The vapor pressure of water approximation used is the Tetens formula with a validity range between -10 degree C and 75 degree C
Sensor values are measured inside the device housing
This function has a division by zero in the case where T_sensor or T_ambient is equal to -TETENS_BETA_NEGATIVE (-265.5 degree C)

parameterdescription.para: Relative humidity measured by the sensor
Temperature in degree C measured by the sensor
Temperature in degree C measured or estimated outside

detaileddescription.para: Ambient Temperature is calculated by adding an offset to the measured sensor temperature

simplesect.para: This API provides a default value for the temperature offset value.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the compensation factor using the Tetens formula.

detaileddescription.para: Ew(T_sensor) = 0.61078 * exp( A_sensor * T_sensor / (T_sensor + B_sensor)) Ew(T_ambient) = 0.61078 * exp( A_ambient * T_ambient / (T_ambient + B_ambient)) )
A_sensor, B_sensor, A_ambient and B_ambient are dependent on the sign of the corresponding temperature

simplesect.para: This formula has a division by zero in the case where T_sensor or T_ambient is equal to -TETENS_BETA_NEGATIVE (-265.5 degree C)

parameterdescription.para: Temperature in degree C measured at the sensor
Temperature in degree C measured or estimated outside the housing

inbodydescription.para: Four cases are possible for compensation: (1) T_ambient is positive and T_sensor is positive (2) T_ambient is negative and T_sensor is positive (3) T_ambient is negative and T_sensor is negative (4) T_ambient is positive and T_sensor is negative
Case (4) is unlikely since T_sensor is most likely to be higher than T_ambient
Depending on the sign, we will select the correct Tetens compensation constants

briefdescription.para: Register the ambient temperature offset in degree C.

simplesect.para: returnCode Return code indicating state and success of the operation
